```{r LEFTRIGHT_PRE}
# Pooled <- 
Iceland <- count(di, as_label(sp12))
Norway <- count(dn, as_label()) %>% filter(`as_label(r15pad_terror11pre)` != 'Ikke spurt')
Sweden <- count(ds, as_label(lrpown_mp36)) %>% add_row(`as_label(lrpown_mp36)` = NA, n=NA, .before = 5)
LEFTRIGHT <- bind_cols(Iceland, Norway, Sweden)

kable(LEFTRIGHT, booktabs = T, linesep = "", escape = F, caption = "Panel variable names and values",  col.names = linebreak(c("Source Questionnaire", "Iceland", 'n', "Norway", 'n', "Sweden", 'n'))) %>%
  footnote(general = "Variable names. Iceland = sp12, Norway =  r15pad_terror11pre, Sweden = q286")
```
